added.description:
Maximum number of entries per Array of Cards card set 
container. Will be set ergonomically by default.
added.name: G1RemSetArrayOfCardsEntries

added.description:
Maximum number of entries per region in the Array of Cards 
card set container per MB of a heap region.
added.name: G1RemSetArrayOfCardsEntriesBase

added.description:
Percentage at which to coarsen a Howl bitmap to Howl full card 
set container.
added.name: G1RemSetCoarsenHowlBitmapToHowlFullPercent

added.description:
Percentage at which to coarsen a Howl card set to Full card 
set container.
added.name: G1RemSetCoarsenHowlToFullPercent

added.description:
The percentage of free card set memory that G1 should keep as 
percentage of the currently used memory.
added.name: G1RemSetFreeMemoryKeepExcessRatio

added.description:
Time after which the card set free memory task reschedules 
itself if there is work remaining.
added.name: G1RemSetFreeMemoryRescheduleDelayMillis

added.description:
The amount of time that the free memory task should spend 
before a pause of G1RemSetFreeMemoryRescheduleDelayMillis 
length.
added.name: G1RemSetFreeMemoryStepDurationMillis

added.description:
Maximum number of buckets per Howl card set container. The 
default gives at worst bitmaps of size 8k. This showed to be a 
good tradeoff between bitmap size (waste) and cacheability of 
the bucket array. Must be a power of two.
added.name: G1RemSetHowlMaxNumBuckets

added.description:
Number of buckets per Howl card set container. Must be a power 
of two. Will be set ergonomically by default.
added.name: G1RemSetHowlNumBuckets

added.description:
If an error in the JVMCI native library occurs, save the 
error data to this file
[default: ./
added.name: JVMCINativeLibraryErrorFile

removed.description:
(Deprecated) Require the VM to acquire the class loader lock 
before calling loadClass() even for class loaders registering 
as parallel capable
removed.name: AlwaysLockClassLoader

removed.description:
(Deprecated) Threshold of number of revocations per type to 
try to rebias all objects in the heap of that type
removed.name: BiasedLockingBulkRebiasThreshold

removed.description:
(Deprecated) Threshold of number of revocations per type to 
permanently revoke biases of all objects in the heap of that 
type
removed.name: BiasedLockingBulkRevokeThreshold

removed.description:
(Deprecated) Decay time (in milliseconds) to re-enable bulk 
rebiasing of a type after previous bulk rebias
removed.name: BiasedLockingDecayTime

removed.description:
(Deprecated) Number of milliseconds to wait before enabling 
biased locking
removed.name: BiasedLockingStartupDelay

removed.description:
Max number of regions for which we keep bitmaps.
Will be set ergonomically by default
removed.name: G1RSetRegionEntries

removed.description: Max number of regions in a fine-grain table per MB.
removed.name: G1RSetRegionEntriesBase

removed.description:
Max number of entries per region in a sparse table.
Will be set ergonomically by default.
removed.name: G1RSetSparseRegionEntries

removed.description:
Max number of entries per region in a sparse table 
per MB.
removed.name: G1RSetSparseRegionEntriesBase

removed.description: (Deprecated) Print statistics of biased locking in JVM
removed.name: PrintBiasedLockingStatistics

removed.description:
(Deprecated) Print per-lock-site statistics of biased locking 
in JVM
removed.name: PrintPreciseBiasedLockingStatistics

removed.description: Print optimization of raw unsafe ops
removed.name: PrintUnsafeOptimization

removed.description: (Deprecated) Generate biased locking code in C2 ideal graph
removed.name: UseOptoBiasInlining
